mapper.select: select file.url, item.id, item.title, user.nickname, user.avatar, item.price, item.createtime, guroupu.collectionnum, gi.grade from item left join user on item.userid = user.id left join itempic on item.id = itempic.itemid and itempic.ishead = 1 left join file on itempic.picid = file.id left join (select itemid, count(*) as collectionnum from usercollect group by itemid) as guroupu on item.id = guroupu.itemid left join (select substr(id, 3, 2) as grade, id from user) as gi on item.userid = gi.id order by createtime desc limit #{arg0}, #{arg1}
